data.name: OVIVO Soundtrack by Brokenkites + Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Brokenkites writes thematic electronic soundtracks for the movie that you're living. It's music for time travelers, spacepersons, and rogue secret agents. Brokenkites is currently stationed in Antarctica and is documenting the secret development of a transdimensional gateway device.

Track List


01 Aether I OVIVO mix
02 Arc's Angel OVIVO mix
03 As I Am So You Shall Be OVIVO mix
04 Back To Zero OVIVO mix
05 Galactic OVIVO mix
06 Islands OVIVO mix
07 Origami OVIVO mix
08 Rain of Cynics OVIVO mix
09 Resonator OVIVO mix
10 Silent Sun I OVIVO mix
11 Subterrainea OVIVO mix
12 Techtonics OVIVO mix
13 Wood Between the Worlds OVIVO mix
